data.name: System Monitoring - Otel
data.description: View and monitor the primary metrics of Host health and CPU, Memory, Disk and Network usage.

markdown.markdownText:
* **CPU/Memory/Disk Utilization Thresholds:**
    * 0% - 70% → 🟢 Normal
    * 70% - 90% → 🟠 Warning
    * Above 90% → 🔴 Critical

**Note: Threshold values are configurable.**

widgets.title: Total Ram in GB Per Host

promqlQuery.value: (100 * sum(system_filesystem_usage_By{state="used", cloud_provider=~"{{cloud_provider}}",host_name=~"{{host_name}}",cloud_account_id=~"{{cloud_account_id}}",cloud_region=~"{{cloud_region}}",os_type=~"{{os_type}}"}) by (host_name,device) / sum(system_filesystem_usage_By{ cloud_provider=~"{{cloud_provider}}",host_name=~"{{host_name}}",cloud_account_id=~"{{cloud_account_id}}",cloud_region=~"{{cloud_region}}",os_type=~"{{os_type}}"}) by (host_name,device)) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Disk FileSystem Usage - Per Mount point
